content:
Hi all,

I've recently been playing around with embedding optimised (post-LTO) bitcode in programs as part of a JITting project we are working on.

Up until now, I can only experiment with C programs, as the rust compiler, for some reason, makes a corrupted bitcode section. Since our code-base is a rust lib, I'd like to be able to write my tests in Rust (and not C, which makes the build system complicated for us).

Before trying to fix this, I was hoping to strike up discussion. Does anyone have any comments or input?

Thanks
